channel.title: Mike's AI Game Podcast
channel.description: AI Generated Podcasts for the games in Mike's game library. Specifically tailored towards Mike's personality.

item.title: Sakura Beach - 2025-02-27 - 377680
item.description: "Sakura Beach" (Steam App ID: 377680) (Generator Version: Mike11) From the makers of Sakura Spirit, Sakura Angels and Sakura Fantasy this time working together with the artist Inma to bring you this visual novel dating sim on the beach! Seiji is a daydreamer who spends too much time thinking about space.

item.title: Castle Crashers - 2025-02-27 - 204360
item.description: "Castle Crashers" (Steam App ID: 204360) (Generator Version: Mike11) Hack, slash, and smash your way to victory in this award winning 2D arcade adventure from The Behemoth!

item.title: Else Heart.Break() - 2025-02-27 - 400110
item.description: "Else Heart.Break()" (Steam App ID: 400110) (Generator Version: Mike11) A game about friendship, love and technology in a place where bits have replaced atoms.

item.title: Small World 2 - Cursed! - 2025-02-27 - 259590
item.description: "Small World 2 - Cursed!" (Steam App ID: 259590) (Generator Version: Mike11)

item.title: Quantum: Recharged - 2025-02-27 - 2460490
item.description: "Quantum: Recharged" (Steam App ID: 2460490) (Generator Version: Mike11) Dodge and encircle your enemies in this neon-drenched revival of the one-of-a-kind arcade classic!

item.title: MetaPhysical - 2025-02-27 - 1568620
item.description: "MetaPhysical" (Steam App ID: 1568620) (Generator Version: Mike11) Supernatural phenomena are on the rise. In MetaPhysical you and up to 5 other friends can go on the hunt for eerie creatures to put an end to their sinister activities! Whether it's an ordinary ghost or a demon, your task is to identify the rumbling creature and then finish it off.

item.title: Sanctum: Killing Floor DLC - 2025-02-27 - 91606
item.description: "Sanctum: Killing Floor DLC" (Steam App ID: 91606) (Generator Version: Mike11)

item.title: Sword of the Stars: The Pit Gold DLC - 2025-02-27 - 258930
item.description: "Sword of the Stars: The Pit Gold DLC" (Steam App ID: 258930) (Generator Version: Mike11)

item.title: Tanuki Sunset - 2025-02-27 - 1251460
item.description: "Tanuki Sunset" (Steam App ID: 1251460) (Generator Version: Mike11) Master the longboard as you drift through stunning mountain ranges, swerve through bustling city streets, and along the sandy beaches of Sunset Island. Train to perform epic tricks, from jumping off-ramp to longboarding backwards. Grab Your Longboard and Race to the Top in Tanuki Sunset!

item.title: Cthulhu Saves the World - 2025-02-27 - 107310
item.description: "Cthulhu Saves the World " (Steam App ID: 107310) (Generator Version: Mike11) The lord of insanity, Cthulhu was all set to plunge the world into insanity and destruction when his powers were sealed by a mysterious sorcerer. The only way for him to break the curse is to become a true hero. Save the world to destroy it in an epic parody RPG journey of redemption, romance, and insanity!

item.title: Gunbrella - 2025-02-27 - 1580180
item.description: "Gunbrella" (Steam App ID: 1580180) (Generator Version: Mike11) Uncover the dark secrets of a gritty, tangled metropolis and battle diabolic villains with your trusty Gunbrella, a bulletproof brolly that doubles as a firearm.

item.title: Thunder Wolves - 2025-02-27 - 232970
item.description: "Thunder Wolves" (Steam App ID: 232970) (Generator Version: Mike11) When this “wolf pack” strikes, you hear the thunder roll. The Thunder Wolves attack from the air. They are mercenaries, and the best helicopter pilots in the world. Every one of them is ready for action at all times—and ready to fight evil, wherever it lurks.

item.title: Disney Speedstorm - 2025-02-27 - 1537830
item.description: "Disney Speedstorm" (Steam App ID: 1537830) (Generator Version: Mike11) Welcome to Disney Speedstorm! Drift into the ultimate hero-based combat racing game, set on high-speed circuits inspired by Disney and Pixar worlds. Master each character’s unique skills and claim victory in this thrilling arcade racing experience from the creators of the Asphalt series!

item.title: The Long Dark: WINTERMUTE - 2025-02-27 - 2095000
item.description: "The Long Dark: WINTERMUTE" (Steam App ID: 2095000) (Generator Version: Mike11)

item.title: Type Knight - 2025-02-27 - 1006220
item.description: "Type Knight" (Steam App ID: 1006220) (Generator Version: Mike11) Purge the graveyard from the forces of Evil by using your typing skills.

item.title: Tomb Raider: Guerilla Skin - 2025-02-27 - 208808
item.description: "Tomb Raider: Guerilla Skin" (Steam App ID: 208808) (Generator Version: Mike11)

item.title: Max Payne - 2025-02-27 - 12140
item.description: "Max Payne" (Steam App ID: 12140) (Generator Version: Mike11) Max Payne is a man with nothing to lose in the violent, cold urban night. A fugitive undercover cop framed for murder, hunted by cops and the mob, Max is a man with his back against the wall, fighting a battle he cannot hope to win. Prepare for pain…

item.title: Sweet Lily Dreams - 2025-02-27 - 300540
item.description: "Sweet Lily Dreams" (Steam App ID: 300540) (Generator Version: Mike11) The peaceful Realm of Dreams is about to be consumed by a terrible and maleficent nightmare. You must venture into the darkness and battle fearsome literary foes such as Hyde, the Headless Horseman and Dracula. Join Lily on a sugar-coated adventure about inner strength with a dark interior.

item.title: Double Fine Adventure: EP12 - A Whole Different Game Experience - 2025-02-27 - 402601
item.description: "Double Fine Adventure: EP12 - A Whole Different Game Experience" (Steam App ID: 402601) (Generator Version: Mike11) A collaboration between 2 Player Productions and Double Fine Productions, the "Double Fine Adventure" series chronicles the creation of “Broken Age,” a three-year journey spanning twenty episodes, and the most in-depth look at video game development ever created.

item.title: Kardboard Kings - 2025-02-27 - 1298480
item.description: "Kardboard Kings" (Steam App ID: 1298480) (Generator Version: Mike11) Open your own Card shop by the seaside! Buy, trade and sell Cards, OR keep them for your own collection! Earn reputation with customers, beat your shop goals, unlock new decorations, and host exciting events to bring everyone to the best Card shop in town!

item.title: Arise: A Simple Story - 2025-02-27 - 866140
item.description: "Arise: A Simple Story" (Steam App ID: 866140) (Generator Version: Mike11) Embark on an emotional journey of losing the love of one's life. Manipulate time, solve puzzles, reshape surroundings as you push forward into the bittersweet recollections of a past life. This is a story about happiness and hardship, joy and sorrow. A story that all of us will one day experience.

item.title: The Incredible Adventures of Van Helsing: Final Cut - 2025-02-27 - 400170
item.description: "The Incredible Adventures of Van Helsing: Final Cut" (Steam App ID: 400170) (Generator Version: Mike11) Embark on an adventure in a gothic-noir world, where mad science threatens the peace between monsters and mortals. The Incredible Adventures of Van Helsing: Final Cut is definitive edition of the trilogy with six playable classes and a new endgame mode with a huge variety of open missions!

item.title: Leaf Blower Revolution - Idle Game - 2025-02-27 - 1468260
item.description: "Leaf Blower Revolution - Idle Game" (Steam App ID: 1468260) (Generator Version: Mike11) Blow leaves, upgrade your gear, and automate your progress as you explore the Leaf Universe. A satisfying incremental idle game where every leaf blown brings you closer to the next big upgrade. Simple, relaxing, and endlessly rewarding. Let the leaves fall, and your progress rise!

item.title: Heavy Burden - 2025-02-27 - 2070000
item.description: "Heavy Burden" (Steam App ID: 2070000) (Generator Version: Mike11) How does Sisyphus feel as he climbs to the top of the mountain? Tired from the weight of the stone, the scorching sun, and the steep climbs, he nevertheless continues on his way up. What awaits him there?

item.title: Army Men RTS - 2025-02-27 - 694500
item.description: "Army Men RTS" (Steam App ID: 694500) (Generator Version: Mike11) Army Men RTS brings you back to the days of staging battles with tiny plastic soldiers in your backyard...except these green soldiers carry out your every command!

item.title: Capcom Arcade Stadium：FINAL FIGHT - 2025-02-27 - 1556712
item.description: "Capcom Arcade Stadium：FINAL FIGHT" (Steam App ID: 1556712) (Generator Version: Mike11)

item.title: 20 Minutes Till Dawn - 2025-02-27 - 1966900
item.description: "20 Minutes Till Dawn" (Steam App ID: 1966900) (Generator Version: Mike11) 20 Minutes Till Dawn is a survival roguelite where endless hordes of creatures lurk from the dark. Craft an array of overpowering builds and eradicate waves of Lovecraftian nightmares. Will you be able to survive the night?

item.title: Wizard Of Walls - 2025-02-27 - 1548800
item.description: "Wizard Of Walls" (Steam App ID: 1548800) (Generator Version: Mike11) A dungeon/maze shooter like the old arcade classic "Wizard Of Wor". It has local/online multiplayer for up to 4 players.

item.title: Pinball FX3 - Jurassic World™ Pinball - 2025-02-27 - 782110
item.description: "Pinball FX3 - Jurassic World™ Pinball" (Steam App ID: 782110) (Generator Version: Mike11)

item.title: Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War III - 2025-02-27 - 285190
item.description: "Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War III" (Steam App ID: 285190) (Generator Version: Mike11) Step into a brutal battle between three warring factions In Dawn of War III you will have no choice but to face your foes when a catastrophic weapon is found on the mysterious world of Acheron.
